abstract.text: A Swift framework that makes it easier to create beautiful console applications.
A segment containing text with an optional style.
Represents a line of terminal segments.
Represents a segment of text, whitespace, line breaks,
Represents something that can be  rendered to the terminal.
A segment containing a control sequence code.
Appends text with an optional style to the paragraph.
A measurement that has a minimum and maximum value.
Support for text decorations are up to the terminal.
Widget that renders styled text and auto wraps at line breaks as needed.
